video.title: Caillou
video.synopsis: Happy-go-lucky preschooler Caillou explores his world with his friends and family, and he learns valuable life lessons about teamwork along the way.

episodes.synopsis: Caillou decides to keep a cricket as a pet; gets a little jealous when Sarah gets a new dog; and develops a fear of spiders.
episodes.title: Caillou Cares & Other Stories: Caillou Cares

episodes.synopsis: Caillou learns how to roller skate; attempts to take a picture of a rabbit in Grandma's garden; and tries his best to whistle.
episodes.title: Caillou Cares & Other Stories: Can Do Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou and Leo can't play hockey when they want to; rain threatens to ruin the family's beach plans; and Caillou visits an indoor rock climbing wall.
episodes.title: Caillou Cares & Other Stories: Caillou Gets Active

episodes.synopsis: Caillou learns how to make homemade pizza; Grandpa and Grandma drop by to babysit; and Caillou tries his hand at a new sport: bowling.
episodes.title: Caillou Cares & Other Stories: Cooking with Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou invites an older friend over to play; decides he wants to wear glasses; and gets ready for Miss Martin's dance party.
episodes.title: Big Time Caillou & Other Stories: Big Time Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou becomes a "shadow scientist"; Daniel tries to put together a model plane without the instructions; and Caillou has fun jumping in the leaves.
episodes.title: Big Time Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou Explores

episodes.synopsis: Caillou and Leo split the cost of a toy shuttle; Grandpa coaches Caillou's soccer team; and Miss Martin names Caillou "Safety Helper" for the day.
episodes.title: Big Time Caillou & Other Stories: Blast Off to Space

episodes.synopsis: Caillou promises to bring his classmates some rasperries; Daddy builds an ice rink in the backyard; and Caillou gets a bad case of the hiccups.
episodes.title: Big Time Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou Learns Patience

episodes.synopsis: Caillou helps some tiny frogs cross the street; leaves a trail of glitter around the preschool; and complains about having to tidy up the classroom.
episodes.title: Safety First Caillou & Other Stories: Safety First Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou changes his mind about trading his toy shovel; longs for a pair of light-up sneakers; and works hard to earn the toy cars he really wants.
episodes.title: Safety First Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou's Toy Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Caillou tries to learn a song on his keyboard; attempts to befriend a new classmate; and looks desperately for someone to play with.
episodes.title: Safety First Caillou & Other Stories: Considerate Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Grandma brings over treats that are full of olives; Caillou and Leo accidentally shatter Rosie's clay poodle; and Caillou breaks a new toy.
episodes.title: Safety First Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou Tells the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Caillou crashes Sarah's kite into a tree; tries to play a game with some friends; and keeps forgetting to return Leo's special marker.
episodes.title: Creative Caillou & Other Stories: Creative Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou learns about composting; gets upset when Daddy has to cut down an old tree; and tries to save water by cutting out baths and tooth-brushing.
episodes.title: Creative Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou Helps Out

episodes.synopsis: Caillou makes a paper mache bunny for Rosie, accidentally breaks Daddy's guitar string and teaches Rosie how to blow raspberries.
episodes.title: Creative Caillou & Other Stories: Big Brother Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou makes a model of the solar system with Daddy; learns about diabetes from a classmate; and tries to prove Gilbert didn't take Mommy's keys.
episodes.title: Creative Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou's Discoveries

episodes.synopsis: Caillou insists he can run a marathon; enjoys sailing with Daddy and Grandpa; and tries desperately to grow bigger -- by any means necessary!
episodes.title: Growing Up Caillou & Other Stories: Growing Up Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou hates it when Clementine copies him; forgets to give his friends credit for helping him with a poster; and decorates his new playhouse.
episodes.title: Growing Up Caillou & Other Stories: Good Friend Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou helps an injured Mrs. Howard around the house; is determined to win a ribbon in the "Charity Fun Run"; and gets paired up with a new student.
episodes.title: Growing Up Caillou & Other Stories: Thoughtful Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou loses a book Miss Martin lends him; tries to help Leo fix a mistake; and talks to his dad about standing up to his classmates.
episodes.title: Growing Up Caillou & Other Stories: Caillou Shows Responsibility

episodes.synopsis: Caillou distracts Grandpa from a birthday surprise party; gets to look after the class hamster; and tries to give Daddy a weed-free garden.
episodes.title: Caillou's Play Time & Other Stories: Caillou in the Garden

episodes.synopsis: Caillou is afraid to ride a camel at the zoo; freezes up when it's time to go sledding on the "Big Hill"; and is certain he saw a flying saucer.
episodes.title: Caillou's Play Time & Other Stories: Caillou the Brave

episodes.synopsis: Caillou spends a rainy day doing puzzles with Daddy; befriends a ladybug when he's bored; and is plagued by a streak of bad luck.
episodes.title: Caillou's Play Time & Other Stories: Caillou's Play Time

episodes.synopsis: Caillou wants to keep a lost kitten he found; Grandma knits Caillou a sweater; and Caillou gets frustrated while trying to build a model truck.
episodes.title: Caillou's Favorite Things & Other Stories: Caillou's Favorite Things

episodes.synopsis: Caillou gets to be a conductor when a musician visits his preschool; pretends to be a superhero with Leo; and decides he wants to be a lion.
episodes.title: Caillou's Favorite Things & Other Stories: Team Player Caillou

episodes.synopsis: Caillou's class visits a butterfly conservatory; Grandma coaches Caillou's soccer team; and Caillou has to adapt to a substitute teacher.
episodes.title: Caillou's Favorite Things & Other Stories: Surprise Caillou!
